threat: An attacker could use this issue to cause X.Org to crash, or to possibly execute arbitrary code.
A local attacker could use this flaw to cause a xkb cache file to be loaded by another user, resulting in a denial of service.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
After a standard system update you need to reboot your computer to make
all the necessary changes.
